message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,000.  I believe this is a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However,  $9,000 undervalues the product significantly.  I could meet you halfway at $10,000. This offer reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to go up to $9,500, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me there?
